name: That's Melvin The Melbournien
description:
Game a Week - Project 3:  Melbourne

'That's Melvin The Melbournien' is a character customisation game where you disguise ole mate Melvin, so he can blend into Melbourne society. 

Turn Melvin into the biggest hunk of spunk this side of fountain gate. Or dress him up to impress the whole organic food market.

CONTROLS:

  • Left click does everything pretty much

Please leave some feedback! Tell me what you love, tell me what you hate*, tell me what you ate for lunch.

* Don't actually tell me what you hate because I'm sensitive and will sob at any harsh criticism*
